title: What trajectory should an asteroid have to move Earth (and Moon) further away from the Sun? - Quora

response.answer_text: It wouldn’t. Not by anything noticeable or really even measurable, no matter how close it gets. The total mass of all the asteroids in the asteroid belt is only 4% of the moon. So the Earth can greatly affect the trajectory of an asteroid or comet, but they wouldn’t affect our orbit. It would take another planet to do that.
